body_html:
Interested also just found this when trying to move a tf.estimator based model to Keras and realizing the data prep and

training_input_fn = tf.estimator.inputs.pandas_input_fn(x=training_data, y=training_label, batch_size=64, shuffle=True, num_epochs=None)

Would not work to feed Keras, looking forward to it landing, the ability to use the estimator and experiment stuff with Keras is interesting

body:
Interested also just found this when trying to move a tf.estimator based model to Keras and realizing the data prep and

`training_input_fn = tf.estimator.inputs.pandas_input_fn(x=training_data, y=training_label, batch_size=64, shuffle=True, num_epochs=None)`

Would not work to feed Keras, looking forward to it landing, the ability to use the estimator and experiment stuff with Keras is interesting
